mapper.select: SELECT ts.trip_share_id, ts.trip_share_title, ts.trip_share_content, ts.trip_plan_id, ts.trip_share_add_date, ts.trip_share_mod_date, ts.member_id FROM trip_share ts ORDER BY ts.trip_share_add_date DESC
SELECT td.*, tp.trip_plan_start_day, tp.trip_plan_arrive_day FROM trip_day td JOIN trip_plan tp ON td.trip_plan_id = tp.trip_plan_id WHERE td.trip_plan_id = #{tripPlanId}

SELECT trip_share_id_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO trip_share ( trip_share_id, trip_share_title, trip_plan_id, trip_share_add_date, trip_share_mod_date, member_id ) VALUES ( #{tripShareId}, #{tripShareTitle}, #{tripPlanId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{memberId} )

INSERT INTO trip_share_content ( TRIP_SHARE_ID, TRIP_DAY_ID, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_DAY, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_PLACE, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_ADDRESS, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_DATE, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_IMAGE, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_MAPX, TRIP_SHARE_DAY_MAPY, TRIP_SHARE_CONTENT, TRIP_PLAN_START_DAY, TRIP_PLAN_ARRIVE_DAY ) VALUES ( #{tripShareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tripDayId}, #{tripDayDay, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tripDayPlace}, #{tripDayAddress}, #{tripDayDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{tripDayImage}, #{tripDayMapx, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tripDayMapy, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tripShareContent}, #{tripPlanStartDay, jdbcType=DATE}, #{tripPlanArriveDay, jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT ts.* FROM trip_share ts WHERE ts.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY ts.trip_share_add_date DESC

SELECT ts.trip_share_id, ts.trip_share_title, ts.trip_share_add_date, ts.trip_share_mod_date,
tsc.trip_day_id, tsc.trip_share_day_day, tsc.trip_share_day_date, tsc.trip_share_day_address, tsc.trip_share_day_place, tsc.trip_share_day_image, tsc.trip_share_day_mapx, tsc.trip_share_day_mapy, tsc.trip_share_content, tsc.trip_plan_start_day, tsc.trip_plan_arrive_day,
ts.member_id
FROM trip_share ts JOIN member m ON ts.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN trip_share_content tsc ON ts.trip_share_id = tsc.trip_share_id WHERE ts.trip_share_id = #{tripShareId} ORDER BY tsc.trip_share_day_day ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_plan ( trip_plan_title, trip_plan_content, trip_plan_start_day, trip_plan_arrive_day, member_id, trip_plan_add_date, trip_plan_mod_date ) SELECT ts.trip_share_title, '', -- 복사용이므로 내용 비워둠 tsc.trip_plan_start_day, tsc.trip_plan_arrive_day, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE FROM trip_share ts JOIN trip_share_content tsc ON ts.trip_share_id = tsc.trip_share_id WHERE ts.trip_share_id = #{tripShareId} AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO trip_content ( trip_plan_id, trip_day_day, trip_day_address, trip_day_image, trip_day_date, trip_day_place, trip_day_mapy, trip_day_mapx, trip_day_content_id ) SELECT #{tripPlanId}, tsc.trip_share_day_day, tsc.trip_share_day_address, tsc.trip_share_day_image, tsc.trip_share_day_date, tsc.trip_share_day_place, tsc.trip_share_day_mapy, tsc.trip_share_day_mapx, tsc.trip_share_content_id FROM trip_share_content tsc WHERE tsc.trip_share_id = #{tripShareId} ORDER BY tsc.trip_share_day_day ASC
